0:
One day Tamu was going to school. 
His mother had packed tasty bread for his lunch
1: Lava saw the lunch box. He wanted to eat the bread.
2:
Lava tripped Tamu and the lunch box fell down. 
Lava grabbed the lunch box and ate the bread.
3: Tamu went to school very sad.
4:
In the afternoon, Yoyo saw Tamu was not eating anything. 
Tamu cried and told what had happened.
5:
Yoyo shared her lunch with Tamu. 
Yoyo wanted to teach Lava a lesson. 
So she asked Tamu to pack mud balls in his lunch.
6: Next day, Tamu put mud balls in his lunch box.
7: Lava again tripped Tamu and took his lunch box.
8:
Lava greedily gobbled up the mud balls. He did not like them. 
He learnt his lesson. We should never steal things from others.
